Question: The subsequent crisis was "a defining moment of her [this person's] premiership".
Hints: In the Falklands, this person Day has been marked every 10 January since 1992, commemorating her visit in 1983.
On 11 June 2004, this person attended the state funeral service for Ronald Reagan.
This person was not initially the obvious replacement, but she eventually became the main challenger, promising a fresh start.
